author: AFFiNE
description: Moving into your first apartment? Use this First Apartment Checklist to cover all the essentials for every room, from kitchen basics to bedroom necessities, so you’re ready for a smooth transition!
md:
Setting up your first apartment can be both exciting and overwhelming. The First Apartment Checklist ensures you have all the essentials needed for each room, from kitchenware and cleaning supplies to bedroom comfort and living room essentials. This checklist is an excellent resource for first-time renters or anyone looking to make their new space functional and cozy.


## Essentials for Your First Apartment


### Kitchen Essentials


Your kitchen is one of the most vital areas in your apartment. This section includes the key items for cooking, dining, and keeping things organized.


 • **Cooking Supplies**: Pots, pans, spatula, ladle, cutting board, knives


 • **Utensils**: Forks, spoons, knives, measuring cups, can opener


 • **Appliances**: Microwave, toaster, coffee maker (if needed)


 • **Food Storage**: Containers, plastic wrap, foil, zip-lock bags


 • **Cleaning Supplies**: Dish soap, sponge, kitchen towels, trash bags


### Living Room Essentials


This area is where you’ll likely relax and entertain guests. Furnishing it well creates a comfortable and inviting environment.


 • **Furniture**: Couch or chairs, coffee table, TV stand (if applicable)


 • **Entertainment**: Television, remote control, speakers


 • **Lighting**: Lamps, overhead lights, extra bulbs


 • **Decor**: Throw pillows, blankets, rugs, wall art


### Bedroom Essentials


A cozy and functional bedroom setup is important for good rest and relaxation.


 • **Bedding**: Sheets, pillowcases, comforter, mattress protector


 • **Storage**: Closet organizers, hangers, dresser


 • **Furniture**: Bed frame, bedside table, lamp


 • **Other**: Alarm clock, mirror, laundry basket


### Bathroom Essentials


Ensure your bathroom is fully stocked for convenience from day one.


 • **Towels**: Bath towels, hand towels, washcloths


 • **Toiletries**: Soap, shampoo, toothbrush holder, toothpaste


 • **Cleaning Supplies**: Toilet brush, toilet cleaner, shower cleaner


 • **Extras**: Shower curtain, bath mat, storage for toiletries


### Miscellaneous Essentials


These items cover additional necessities that will make your apartment feel complete.


 • **Cleaning Supplies**: Broom, mop, vacuum, all-purpose cleaner


 • **First Aid Kit**: Bandages, antiseptic wipes, pain relievers


 • **Laundry Supplies**: Laundry detergent, fabric softener, drying rack


 • **Tool Kit**: Screwdriver, hammer, measuring tape
title: First Apartment Checklist
